mapper.sql: T.TRAN_NO, T.TRAN_STATUS_CODE AS TRAN_CODE, T.ORDER_DATA AS ORDER_DATE, T.DEMAILADDR AS DIVY_ADDR, TO_CHAR(T.DLVY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DIVY_DATE, T.DLVY_REQUEST, T.PAYMENT_OPTION, T.RECEIVER_NAME, T.RECEIVER_PHONE, U.USER_ID AS BUYER_ID, U.USER_NAME AS BUYER_NAME, U.CELL_PHONE AS BUYER_CELL_PHONE, U.ADDR AS BUYER_ADDR, U.EMAIL AS BUYER_EMAIL, U.REG_DATE AS BUYER_REG_DATE, P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_DETAIL, P.MANUFACTURE_DAY, P.PRICE, P.IMAGE_FILE, P.REG_DATE
FROM TRANSACTION T LEFT JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_ID = T.BUYER_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PROD_NO = T.PROD_NO

if.test: search != null and search.searchCondition != null and search.searchKeyword != null and search.searchKeyword != ''
